products.title: Legacy Ivory Roller Blind
products.description: The legacy blind is a beautiful, elegant and modern textured fabric which is available in a range of soft colours. This cream roller blind is the perfect addition to any room as the neutral tone will go with existing decor whilst the pattern will add a stylish feel.
